languages.text: Многие планетарные аристократы запятнали себя некомпетентностью и лишились титулов. Из способных к наукам и управлению подданных будет создано новое дворянство химкнязей. Те, кто сможет мудро распорядиться своими феодами-агрокомплексами, строго удержав простолюдинов в повиновении и увеличив выработку редких органических химикатов, сохранят свои места.

traits.locale_text: Засадить огромные агрокомплексы интересной химией, повысить местную аристократию до феодалов-химбаронов, погоняющих сервов кнутами.

languages.text: Many planetary aristocrats have stained themselves with incompetence and lost their titles. A new nobility of Chem-Princes will be created out of subjects who prove capable in sciences and governance. Those who succeed in wisely managing their agri-complex fiefs, strictly maintaining obedience among the commoners and increasing the output of rare organic chemicals, will keep their positions.

languages.text: Muchos aristócratas planetarios han demostrado su incompetencia y perdido sus cargos. Una nueva nobleza formada por quimiopríncipes será fundada a partir de súbditos que demuestren ser hábiles en materias científicas y de gobierno. Quienes logren dirigir sus feudos de complejos agrícolas y mantener la obediencia de los campesinos mientras aumentan la producción de productos químicos orgánicos raros conservarán sus cargos.
languages.original_text: Many planetary aristocrats have stained themselves with incompetence and lost their titles. A new nobility of Chem-Princes will be created out of subjects who prove capable in sciences and governance. Those who succeed in wisely managing their agri-complex fiefs, strictly maintaining obedience among the commoners and increasing the output of rare organic chemicals, will keep their positions.

traits.locale_text: Muchos aristócratas planetarios han demostrado su incompetencia y perdido sus cargos. Una nueva nobleza formada por quimiopríncipes será fundada a partir de súbditos que demuestren ser hábiles en materias científicas y de gobierno. Quienes logren dirigir sus feudos de complejos agrícolas y mantener la obediencia de los campesinos mientras aumentan la producción de productos químicos orgánicos raros conservarán sus cargos.

languages.text: De nombreux aristocrates de la planète se sont rendus coupables d'une incompétence crasse qui leur a coûté leur titre. Une nouvelle noblesse de chimioprinces sera désignée parmi les sujets ayant montré des aptitudes dans les domaines des sciences et de la gouvernance. Ceux qui parviendront à gérer judicieusement les agri-complexes de leur fief, à s'assurer l'obéissance du bas peuple et à accroître la production de composés organiques rares conserveront leur statut.
languages.original_text: Many planetary aristocrats have stained themselves with incompetence and lost their titles. A new nobility of Chem-Princes will be created out of subjects who prove capable in sciences and governance. Those who succeed in wisely managing their agri-complex fiefs, strictly maintaining obedience among the commoners and increasing the output of rare organic chemicals, will keep their positions.

traits.locale_text: De nombreux aristocrates de la planète se sont rendus coupables d'une incompétence crasse qui leur a coûté leur titre. Une nouvelle noblesse de chimioprinces sera désignée parmi les sujets ayant montré des aptitudes dans les domaines des sciences et de la gouvernance. Ceux qui parviendront à gérer judicieusement les agri-complexes de leur fief, à s'assurer l'obéissance du bas peuple et à accroître la production de composés organiques rares conserveront leur statut.

languages.text: 行星上的许多贵族因为一无所长而使自己蒙羞，失去了尊贵的头衔。与此同时，那些证明自己拥有卓越的科学素养或治理才能的臣民形成了一支新兴的贵族，自称“生化王子”。只要能够顺当地管理自己的综合农业中心封地、严格保证臣民的顺从并提高珍稀有机化学品的产量，这些贵族就能站稳脚跟、保住地位。
languages.original_text: Many planetary aristocrats have stained themselves with incompetence and lost their titles. A new nobility of Chem-Princes will be created out of subjects who prove capable in sciences and governance. Those who succeed in wisely managing their agri-complex fiefs, strictly maintaining obedience among the commoners and increasing the output of rare organic chemicals, will keep their positions.

traits.locale_text: 行星上的许多贵族因为一无所长而使自己蒙羞，失去了尊贵的头衔。与此同时，那些证明自己拥有卓越的科学素养或治理才能的臣民形成了一支新兴的贵族，自称“生化王子”。只要能够顺当地管理自己的综合农业中心封地、严格保证臣民的顺从并提高珍稀有机化学品的产量，这些贵族就能站稳脚跟、保住地位。

languages.text: 多くの惑星貴族がその無能によって汚名を被り、その肩書を失った。科学と統治において有能であることを証明した臣下から、新たな貴族「ケムプリンセス」が誕生した。農業施設の領地を賢く管理し、平民の服従を厳格に保ち、希少な有機化学物質の生産量を増やすことに成功した者は、その地位を維持することができるのだ。
languages.original_text: Many planetary aristocrats have stained themselves with incompetence and lost their titles. A new nobility of Chem-Princes will be created out of subjects who prove capable in sciences and governance. Those who succeed in wisely managing their agri-complex fiefs, strictly maintaining obedience among the commoners and increasing the output of rare organic chemicals, will keep their positions.

traits.locale_text: 多くの惑星貴族がその無能によって汚名を被り、その肩書を失った。科学と統治において有能であることを証明した臣下から、新たな貴族「ケムプリンセス」が誕生した。農業施設の領地を賢く管理し、平民の服従を厳格に保ち、希少な有機化学物質の生産量を増やすことに成功した者は、その地位を維持することができるのだ。

languages.text: Viele planetare Aristokraten haben sich durch Inkompetenz besudelt und ihre Titel verloren. Es wird ein neuer Adelsstand von Chem-Prinzen geschaffen, aus Untertanen, die sich in Wissenschaft und Führung als fähig erwiesen haben. Behalten darf seine Position, wer sein Agri-Komplex-Lehen weise verwaltet, für strikten Gehorsam unter dem Pöbel sorgt und den Produktionsertrag an seltenen organischen Chemikalien steigert.
languages.original_text: Many planetary aristocrats have stained themselves with incompetence and lost their titles. Those who succeed in wisely managing their agri-complex fiefs, strictly maintaining obedience among the commoners and increasing the output of rare organic chemicals, will keep their positions.

languages.text: Gezegendeki aristokratların birçoğu, liyakatsizlik gösterdikleri için ünvanlarından oldular. İlim ve idare işlerinde kendilerini kanıtlamış kimselerin arasından Kimyevi Prens titrine nail olacak yeni soylular seçilecektir. Tarım komplekslerini akıllıca yönetme hususunda başarılı olan, halk içinde itaatkârlığı fire vermeksizin sağlayabilen ve ender organik kimyasalların üretimini arttıranlar mevkilerini koruyacaktır.
languages.original_text: Many planetary aristocrats have stained themselves with incompetence and lost their titles. A new nobility of Chem-Princes will be created out of subjects who prove capable in sciences and governance. Those who succeed in wisely managing their agri-complex fiefs, strictly maintaining obedience among the commoners and increasing the output of rare organic chemicals, will keep their positions.
